Title: The Mark of the Berserker (1)
Plot: Luke is going for a sleepover at Clyde's house whilst Sarah Jane goes away for the weekend, during which Clyde's estranged father Paul turns up hoping to get to know his son. Meanwhile Rani discovers that one of her classmates is in possession of a strange locket, that can be used to control people.
GuestStars: Joseph Millson, Gary Beadle, Jocelyn Jee Esien, Ace Bhatti, Perry Millward, Huw Higginson, Elijah Baker, Jessica Lewis, Andrew Phillips
